page.title: 09A LEWES DAY....(AGED l2)
page.content: Suddenly my sister rushed into the room. The bleep alarm on my radio had not gone off, it was 7.45am, I would be late for school. I jumped out of bed,dressed in black trousers, blue shirt, grey sweater and stuffed a striped school tie in my pocket. After a rushed breakfast of cereal, scrambled eggs and toast, I brushed my teeth, shoved on my trainers, grabbed my rucksack of school books, and my friends and I cycled to school on our BMX bikes. Lessons that day,after morning assembly,were Design,PE (tennis), history (the Romans), mathematics (learning computer use) and French. School dinner was pizza and chips, with an apple. Home to homework and a walk with the dog.Supper was chicken and veg. Then I saw a TV show until 9.30-BED!
